content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM's culture is increasingly diverse and as a global team we come from over 25 countries across 4 continents but we share a common culture and interests as well as a passion for results.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Individually, we are shaped by our history and our local experience, but collectively we are a global team.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"VALUE PROPOSITION: WHY EPAM?\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(26, 156, 176)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At EPAM, we believe that technology defines business success, and we relentlessly pursue the best solution for every client to solve where others fail. We work together in diverse teams to innovate and deliver RESULTS. RELENTLESSLY.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/4b116256-0df9-40da-ade7-3e65c1cc9c84/PROPOSITION%201.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":802,\"height\":327}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"OUR PILLARS: WHO IS EPAM?\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(26, 156, 176)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Our brand pillars are the most important attributes of the brand and business that we would like to communicate.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/a9e310da-ceee-40ad-821b-9f7704c94e27/Pillars.PNG\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1576,\"height\":528}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"DEVELOPERS' DEVELOPERS\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(57, 194, 215)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We are proud of our heritage as Developers' Developers. We've helped large corporations and technology giants innovate and bring unique products to market: From the roots of SAP's CRM applications, to Google's YouTube Creator Academy, to driving market-leading performance for Expedia, to connecting transactions around the world for EBAY, EPAM persists in playing a significant role in digital transformation around the globe.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We continue to build our expertise and our capabilities for the world's leading technology companies.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"COMMITTED PARTNERS\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(57, 194, 215)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We are relentless in our pursuit of solutions that help our clients and we deliver where others often fall short. We do the right thing, every time – because it's right.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We invest in EPAMers around the world, helping to find and develop the brightest minds and to build dynamic, lasting careers.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Our client projects become communities, which spark innovation.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"PROBLEM SOLVERS\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(57, 194, 215)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As technology drives unprecedented change in traditional and emerging industries, our clients demand more than excellence in engineering. They demand solutions to business challenges that are here today and to those that will become challenges tomorrow.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We bring agility, deep insights and the best engineering capability in the world, to simplify complexity and solve what others cannot.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"OUR VALUES: WHAT MATTERS MOST TO EPAM?\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(26, 156, 176)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We value five core values and their corresponding actions, which determine the way we work from day to day. It all starts with our values – without them, our future successes would be unthinkable.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/84e3de8d-f443-4fdc-aafc-f5c99b882bb5/VALUES_NEW.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":635,\"height\":391}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We value the individual\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(57, 194, 215)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"People are the source of our success. Working in such a complex sector as IT, we try to provide an environment where our employees can thrive.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We provide unlimited opportunities for professional development, including a variety of projects, the chance to try out different roles, working in a team of professionals, and the opportunity to relocate to other countries.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We contribute to the growth and development of our employees through webinars, training on soft and tech skills, conferences, English language education, and more.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We evaluate people based on their results, and we are tolerant to errors, because we know that we learn from our mistakes.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We act as a team\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(57, 194, 215)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"First and foremost, we are a team. We respect each other and try to maintain and develop not only our own ideas, but the ideas of our colleagues as well. When moving from project to project and team to team, it is important to be able to find common ground and learn to work well with different people, including colleagues from other countries who speak different languages.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We maintain our team spirit through project team building initiatives, corporate-sponsored social events, and external sporting events. In addition to customer projects, we involve our people in internal projects as well.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We strive for excellence\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(57, 194, 215)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For any IT company, it is important to maintain high standards of work, to stay abreast of the latest trends, and to constantly develop and strive for innovation. No matter what you do at EPAM, you can make positive contributions at any level. We value self-starters and those who take initiative, because without that, innovation is impossible.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We focus on the customer\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(57, 194, 215)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As an outsourcing company, we especially recognize the importance of developing strong and lasting relationships with our customers. We strive to understand our clients' needs and to become their responsive, responsible and honest business partner.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At present, EPAM has accumulated vast expertise in various business areas, and is actively developing competency centers that allow us to speak with the customer in the same language and offer them services that will make their businesses profitable.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We act with integrity\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(57, 194, 215)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM is a public company. In 2012, the company launched an IPO. It would have been impossible without observing the principles of openness and honesty. In our work, we observe laws, ethical standards and internal rules. Each of us is responsible for our own work. By offering our people freedom and independence, we are also endowing them with responsibility.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"OUR PERSONALITY: HOW DOES EPAM DO IT?\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(26, 156, 176)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We believe that we are different from other companies and we express ourselves in a way that makes it clear that we personify these traits. Six adjectives describe how we approach our work.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We are:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ccd2ca04-f677-4e39-989c-e2c5afa5f01b/PERSONALITIES.PNG\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":797,\"height\":517}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you have any questions, please address them to your Manager or ask them via \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.yammer.com/epam.com/#/threads/inGroup?type=in_group&feedId=4785346&view=all\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Elements.epam.com Yammer group\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
